constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 114 (Wednesday, June 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. LEE of California:
H.R. 4272.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I of the United States Constitution
and its subsequent amendments, and further clarified and
interpreted by the Supreme Court of the United States.
[Page H3580]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: Audit the Pentagon Act of 2021
